## EthersLiquity.sendSTAR() method

Send STAR tokens to an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendSTAR(toAddress: any, amount: any, overrides: any): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toAddress | any | Address of receipient. |
|  amount | any | Amount of STAR to send. |
|  overrides | any |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

any

## Exceptions

Throws [EthersTransactionFailedError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure. Throws [EthersTransactionCancelledError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactioncancellederror.md) if the transaction is cancelled or replaced.
